scripts.release: pnpm format && git add --all && pnpx -q -y bumpp --commit 'ðŸ“¦ v%s' --push --tag

scripts-info.info: Display information about the package scripts
scripts-info.watch: Watch source files and rebuild package when changes are detected.
scripts-info.build: Builds the package and all binaries in production mode
scripts-info.release: Increment package version, commit+tag+push to git, and publish to npm registry.
scripts-info.lint: Check for syntax errors in source code (eslint).
scripts-info.lint:fix: Attempt to fix syntax errors in source code (eslint).
scripts-info.format:check: Check for style conformance in source code (prettier).
scripts-info.format: Format source code in place to ensure style conformance (prettier).
scripts-info.test: Run a test suite to ensure proper code coverage (vitest).
scripts-info.clean: Remove artifacts from the build process.
scripts-info.ni: Run "install" for the appropriate package manager.
scripts-info.nci: Run "install --frozen-lockfile" for the appropriate package manager.
scripts-info.nr: Run a script from the nearest package.json file.
scripts-info.ne: Run a remote package binary without installing any dependencies.
scripts-info.nun: Uninstall a dependency and remove it from package.json
scripts-info.no: Check for local outdated dependencies. Add --global to check global dependencies.
scripts-info.nv: Get all dependencies versions, or modify the root package version.
scripts-info.nd: Print diff patches of files for packages published to npm registry.
scripts-info.nh: Get help on npm, pnpm, or yarn.
scripts-info.na: Agent alias for npm, pnpm, or yarn.
scripts-info.nt: Run a test script to ensure code coverage.
scripts-info.np: Publish a package to the npm registry.
